Melveta Atkinson

I am a passionate, forward thinking Software Developer.

Who am I

Hi, I am Melveta Atkinson and I am a self taught passionate developer.

I have taken this passion and applied that to my personal projects and work life. I enjoying tackling new probelms with adversity and furthering my knowledge and love for all things tech related. I started my journey into software development like many with a curosity in technology and this led me to programming and fell head over heals in love with it. I've taken this love and applied it to blogging, creating tutorials on YouTube, creating my own apps and tutoring college students.

...And Why Work With Me

My primary focus is Front End technologies centering around React JS but I am always pushing myself to learn new and exciting technologies in web development.

Project Github

Gatsby blog site which is based on React and powered by GraphQL. Browse blog posts that are written by me in markdown. These blog post document my journey through software development.

Technologies:

  • Gatsby
  • React
  • GraphQL
Project Github

React application that utilizes the Marvel API and the Context API which is similar to Redux. You can browse your favorite Marvel super and find out some basic information as in their Marvel id number and available comics they are in.

Technologies:

  • React
  • Context API
  • Bootstrap
